title: Relationship between mean radiated energy, mean squared radiated energy and spontaneous power spectrum in a power series expansion of the equations of motion in a free-electron laser

reference.author: J. M. J. Madey
reference.unstructured: J. M. J. Madey:Journ. Appl. Phys.,42, 1906 (1971).
J. D. Jackson:Classical Electrodynamics (New York, N. Y., 1962), p. 480. Jackson’s equation (14.67) yields the spontaneous energy spectrum dI(ω)/dΩ which we divide byT to obtain dP(ω)/dΩ.

reference.author: V. N. Baier
reference.unstructured: V. N. Baier andA. I. Milstein:Phys. Lett.,65 A, 319 (1978);A. Bambini andA. Ranieri:Nuovo Cimento,21 B, 399 (1978);W. B. Colson: Ph. D. Dissertation, unpublished, Stanford University (1977);Phys. Lett.,64 A, 190 (1977);Physics of Quantum Electronics, Vol.5, Chapt. 4 (Reading, Mass., 1977);A. Hasegawa andK. Mima:Appl. Phys. Lett.,29, 542 (1976);F. A. Hopf, P. Meystre, M. O. Scully andW. Louisell:Opt. Comm.,18, 413 (1976);F. A. Hopf, P. Meystre andM. O. Scully:Phys. Rev. Lett.,37, 1342 (1976);H. Al Abawi, F. A. Hopf andP. Meystre:Phys. Rev. A,16, 666 (1977);J. M. J. Madey andD. A. G. Deacon:Co-operative Effects in Matter and Radiation (New York, N. Y., 1977), p. 313.

reference.author: A. Bambini
reference.unstructured: A. Bambini andA. Ranieri:Nuovo Cimento,21 B, 399 (1978);W. B. Colson: Ph. D. Dissertation, unpublished, Stanford University (1977);Phys. Lett.,64 A, 190 (1977);Physics of Quantum Electronics, Vol.5, Chapt. 4 (Reading, Mass., 1977).

It is interesting to note that the general relationship 〈γ f−γ 1〉≈1/2(d/d γ i〈(γ f−γ i)2〉 was derived bySands (Frascati Laboratory, Project ADONE technical note T-73, December 29, 1975) from the quantum theory on the assumption that the statistics for emission and absorption were independent. AlthoughSands obtained the correct answer, the more recent analysis byJ. M. J. Madey andD. A. G. Deacon:Co-operative Effects in Matter and Radiation (New York, N. Y., 1977), p. 313, indicates that emission and absorption do not, in fact, proceed independently.
J. M. J. Madey andD. A. G. Deacon:Co-operative Effects in Matter and Radiation (New York, N. Y., 1977), p. 313.

W. B. Colson: Ph. D. Dissertation, unpublished, Stanford University (1977);Phys. Lett.,64 A, 190 (1977);Physics of Quantum Electronics, Vol.5, Chapt. 4 (Reading, Mass., 1977);A. Gover andA. Yariv:Collective and single-electron interactions of electron beams with electromagnetic waves and free-electron lasers (to be published inApplied Physics);J. M. J. Madey et al.: An approximate technique for the integration of the equations of motion in a free-electron laser, to be published.

For a detailed description of the power series expansion of the equations of motion in a constant-period helix, seeW. B. Colson: Ph. D. Dissertation, unpublished, Stanford University (1977);Phys. Lett.,64 A, 190 (1977);Physics of Quantum Electronics, Vol.5, Chapt. 4 (Reading, Mass., 1977).
